name: Amy Zwaigenbaum
offering: Event Hosting,Event Management, Retreat Centers, Spiritual Coaching
what_you_do: Amy Zwaigenbaum teaches online ESL and interactive performance classes, including a Fairytale Mysteries Series murder mystery solving class for children.
who_you_serve: Children aged 4-14 for ESL instruction, and students aged 7-11 for interactive mystery classes.
social_proof: Bachelor's Degree in Sociology with Minor in English; certified in Paralegal Communications, Special Education, and ESL; 6+ years online ESL teaching experience; 4.8 average rating with 69 reviews on Outschool; 52 classes completed.
signature_programs: Fairytale Mysteries Series (interactive murder mystery solving classes)
business_focus: Online ESL and interactive performance-based education for children.
service_provided: Online ESL teaching, interactive murder mystery classes, Fairytale Mysteries Series
